title: Team Membership Status
description: JSON schema for the possible status of a User with respect to Team membership.

userId.description: The principal id of the user.

isMember.description: true iff the user is a member of the team

hasOpenInvitation.description: true iff the user has an open invitation to join the team

hasOpenRequest.description: true iff the user has an open request to join the team

canJoin.description: true iff the user requesting this status information can join the user to the team
